name: Utf8toansi
tagline: This is a useful tools for convert the UTF-8 code set of file to ANSI.
body:
utf8toansi ========== This is a useful tools for convert the UTF-8 code set of file to ANSI. This project is used c#, please download and compile use visual studio 2010. Get started: Copy the convert.exe to your working file dubole click or open the cmd window to run below command. 
convert.exe [["path"/]*.filetype] [["path"/]*.filetype] [["path"/]*.filetype] [["path"/]*.filetype] ...
Note: This tools is defualt used for PDMS file *.att. so when you dubole click on your working folder,it only just worked at *.att file. Apache 2.0 license.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
